section.title: What's New in &name-icinga; &ver-icinga;
section.para: As usual this is only a brief overview. Please take a look at the Changelog as well if you are missing something.

listitem.para: IDOUtils: ido2db.cfg enable_sla is now deprecated! #3450
Icinga-Web: tackle cronk is now deprecated
increase performance with hash comparing hosts/services on config read #3722
introduce warning level -vv on config verification #3510
keep logfile open, reducing open/close performance decreases #3390
enhance illegal macro character processing performance #3389
increase performance on host->service relation counter (config reading, flapping) #3820
Added date selector for "log file navigation' #3168
Classic-UI can now be installed 'stand-alone' #3869
Added configuration declaration to make expiring acknowledgements the default #3476
Fixed command expansion to handle '%' correctly #3929
Added example configs for nginx and lighttpd #2253
Added process status to every JSON response
Generate valid JSON code when error occurs
Fixed JSON output escaping #3541
use transactions for large object dumps, opt-in config option #3527
add experimental socket queue proxy; opt-in via config option #3533
Oracle - change output fields to clob #3412
Auth Basic Provider search headers
Improve grids (columns width and details)
add AvailReportParser into contrib/ (standalone) #3978
add web gui comparison to beginners #3907
